content: knit against the machines a device storage pouch limit screen time by putting away your device and focusing on creativity instead why our attention is constantly being fractured by our addiction to screens put away distraction and practice regaining control with this knit pouch stop and think before engaging with your screen what would i rather be doing knitting of course what double the amount of stitches cast on join in the round and try a stranded design or mix and match scraps of yarn for a marled effect the possibilities are endless and it s a great size for swatching
